title: first date jitters, ghosting + feeling secure in your relationship: advice with the gals
itunes:title: first date jitters, ghosting + feeling secure in your relationship: advice with the gals
description:
Brooke and Danielle are getting into some of your advice questions today! The gals discuss how to handle being ghosted, what feeling secure in your relationship looks like, how to combat the first date jitters, and more!  Be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies/stories!


Favorites this week:
Green Bucket Hat: https://rvlv.me/JdeaBq 

Attached: The New Science of Adult Attachment and how it Can Help You Find--and Keep--love
Book by Amir Levine and Rachel S. F. Heller


Gals On The Go Instagram https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/ 

Brooke’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/brookemiccio 
Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/ 

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan 
Danielle’s Instagram 
 https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/

Please show by checking out our sponsors!

Pura Vida: To get 20% off your Pura Vida order, text GALS to 38817. 

BetterHelp: Our listeners get 10% off their first month of online therapy at betterhelp.com/GALS
